name: Garden vs Asteroids
description:
You play as a gardener and your garden got caught in a meteor shower. Equip the right tools at the tool station and the right outfit at the tent. Replant the garden with new plants!

When 50% of all the plants are gone, you have lost!

If the frame rate drops or the game crashes(?), the game is considered as beaten!

Combinations:

Fireman (red tent) + fire extinguisher = extinguish the fires

Pickaxe = destroy crater

Farmer (yellow tent) + shovel = replant

Controlls:

- WASD: move

- Scroll wheel: zoom in and out

- Q / Right mouse button: change Outfit or Tool at station

- E  /  Left mouse button: use tool

Assets used

- Kenney Game Assets

- Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
